update CADRIVER
fleetid = null, driverno = null, driverlicense = null, drivername = null, cardno = null, homeaddress = null, issuingorg = null, getcarddate = null, mobile = null, hometel = null, contact = null, tel = null, relationship = null, memo = null, drivertype = null, dtdate = null, userno = null, active = null, locationdate = null, province = null, city = null, address = null, locationmemo = null,
